VerticalLayout.Text:
Welcome to Star Wars: Legion for TTS, v6.0.0-beta.
This is a beta release, and is not suitable for tournament play.
To access the stable version of the mod visit https://go.swlegion.dev/mod.
CHANGELOG
(Since last Beta)
- Added experimental homebrew support. See https://go.swlegion.dev/homebrew.
- We are testing new range/cohesion projection-based rulers. - Please report any bugs/issues with these rulers!.
- We are testing a new card flow (internal to the mod). - Please report any bugs with unit/upgrade/command/battle cards.
- Known Bugs: The in-game list builder .. .. can spawn templates in a wrong position. .. allows upgrades that were hidden before.
(Since last Stable)
- Added Yoda.
- Range rulers are now displayed with color-coded projectors + work with elevation. - Move actions now show a "maximum" move-circle based on selected move speed. - Cohesion circles are also now projectors! - Fixed some bugs with cohesion circles not appearing when placing a unit leader.
- Exporting a unit from a list builder with loadout works correctly. - Updated the models for the T-47 airspeeder, and Droideka. - Replaced all cards across the mod. They should look better now/more consistent.
- Deleted the unused middle (black) clock. - Chess clocks are now hidden by default. Click "Chess Clocks" to show (and use). - Chess clocks (and the UI) are now persisted across saves/loads. - ID tokens are now also tinted as part of the "auto tint" functionality.
